channel.title: Nightline
channel.itunes:author: ABC News
channel.description: Late-night television's award-winning news program. In-depth reporting on the major stories of the day combined with relevant topics in pop culture and entertainment.

item.title: Full Episode: Tuesday, November 28, 2017
item.itunes:author: ABC News
item.itunes:summary: Inside Prince Harry, Meghan Markle's engagement and the story behind the proposal; Women recount their sexual assaults at Massage Envy spa; 12-year-old cancer survivor makes his Carnegie Hall debut

item.title: Full Episode: Saturday, November 25, 2017
item.itunes:author: ABC News
item.itunes:summary: Although police thought the shooting death of Burke O' Brien would result in a home-run case, the murder remains unsolved today.
